header: BRIEF-Vattenfall signs wind power supply deal with Microsoft
body:
* Says ‍has signed a ten-year agreement to power Microsoft’s international data center operations in Netherlands with wind power

* Says according to the agreement, Microsoft will receive one hundred percent of the energy output from Vattenfall’s new onshore wind farm that will be constructed at Wieringermeer polder​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
